page.title: 19Media
page.content:
Local Reports - June 1985
{ OPERATION RALEIGH A local teenager, 19 year old Stephen Gowder, has won a place on an expedition to New Zealand on the flagship 'Raleigh'. Stephen will take part in exploring the country, in community projects and in scientific experiments.
{ BOLSOVER WHEELERS 34 members of the Bolsover Wheelers' Cycling Club took part in a sponsored cycle. They left the Castle Gates, Bolsover at 6.30am and by 7.30pm, 26 members had arrived at Tower Bridge in London. The youngest member to complete the course was Steven Morris, age 12. Â£730 was raised by the group, and a cheque was donated to Bolsover Riding School for the Disabled.
